name: What Magic Is This
description:
🔝 SOMETHING NEW IN TD WORLD!

Let’s go on an exciting journey into the world of magic. You have to fight not only with old enemies, but also with monsters who have joined them!

Assemble your perfect team and go into battle!

You have to conquer 4 kingdoms:

🌲 Once calm and peaceful forest settlements

🦂 Hot and scorpion-infested deserts

🦎 Venomous and mysterious swamps

🌋 Breathtaking volcanoes

FEATURES:

— We have prepared an entirely new mechanic!

— New level — new skill!

—  unique locations with powerful magicians!

— Breathtaking and the most epic battles! 

— Hard bosses that cannot be mastered the first time!

— Doesn't require internet — 100% offline!

— The game is optimized for phones and tablets based on Android OS!

And try not to make mad the shaman😌
